s1.title: multivaluefield widget
s1.p: The fd:multivaluefield is similar to the field widget but can take multiple values. A multivaluefield should always have a fd:datatype element combined with a fd:selection-list, since the user will have to select values from this list. The fd:multivaluefield could be rendered as a list of checkboxes or as a listbox in which the user can select multiple items.
Most of the elements and attributes have the same meaning as for the field widget.
Note: A multivaluefield cannot have a required attribute, instead you should use the value-count validation rule to check the number of values the user has selected.
